translations.cmd.general.sub: Found %d entities, and subscribed %d entities among them
translations.cmd.general.unsub: Found %d entities, and unsubscribed %d entities among them
translations.cmd.entityfield.nosuchfield: No such a field was found in the class of the entity
translations.cmd.entityfield.unexpected: Unexpected exception in getting the field
translations.cmd.entitylog.restart: Warning: All active logs will be restarted
translations.cmd.general.autosub: Entity with type %s won't be subscribed automatically
translations.cmd.general.stopautosub: Entity with type %s won't be subscribed automatically
translations.cmd.general.autosubname: Entity with name %s will be subscribed automatically
translations.cmd.general.stopautosubname: Entity with name %s won't be subscribed automatically
translations.cmd.fixedentityhud.add: Added a new line to the sidebar.
translations.cmd.fixedentityhud.remove: Removed the line named %s from the sidebar.
translations.cmd.freezentity.sub: Found %d entities, and frozen %d entities among them
translations.cmd.freezentity.unsub: Found %d entities, and resumed %d entities among them
translations.cmd.hud.reqsinglepf: Epected 1 targets, but %d targets were found.
translations.cmd.lag.unsupported: Unable to access thread %s in the dedicated server environment.
translations.cmd.messcfg.setglobal: Option %s is now set to %s globally
translations.cmd.messcfg.globalonly: Option %s isn't supported in save-local storage, please click here to set it globally.
translations.cmd.modify.result: Found %d entities, and %d entities among them was affected.
translations.cmd.partlykill.result: Found %d entities, and %d of them are actually killed.
translations.cmd.ride.info: %d candidates are found, and %d of them succeeded to ride
translations.exp.invaildInvocation: %s is not a valid method invocation
translations.exp.invalidlast: Properity %s couldn't be gotten from the last node
translations.exp.unboundedclass: The declaring class of %s couldn't be known
translations.exp.staticl.format: Use # to separate class name and field name, and use / to separate package names, like "java/lang/FLOAT#MAX_VALUE"
translations.exp.invalidbp: %s is not a valid representation of a BlockPos
translations.exp.nokey: The value associated with the given key is not found!
translations.exp.notmap: The result of the previous node of %s is not a Map!
translations.exp.nofieldunlistend: Field %s does not exist or haven't been listened yet!
translations.exp.dupfield: The field has already been listened in such a way.
translations.exp.dupname: The name has already been used
translations.exp.null: A NullPointerException was thrown, possibly because the output of the last node is null.
translations.exp.invalidvec3: %s is not a valid representation of a Vec3d
translations.opt.accessingPathInitStrategy.desc: There are there initializing strategies available: n- Legacy strategy: Accessing paths are only initialized once for its first input, then the result, including the resolved `Member` instances, will be used to access all subsequent inputs.n- Standard strategy: Accessing paths are parsed for every different inputs, and the parsed copies are cached until the inputs are discarded by the garbage collector.n- Strict Strategy: Accessing paths are reinitialized each time they are used.
translations.opt.antiHostCheating.desc: Enable anti-cheating for host player in SP & LAN game.
translations.opt.attackableTnt.desc: TNTs could be killed by attacking.
translations.opt.blockInfoRendererUpdateInFrozenTicks: What will the block information renderers do in ticks frozen by the Carpet.
translations.opt.blockPlacementHistory.desc: Record what the players has placed recently so that you may undo or redo these operations later.
translations.opt.blockShapeToBeRendered.desc: Specify the type of block shape rendered when `renderBlockShape` is enabled. The COLLIDER shape is the  shape used to do calculations about collisions, while the OUTLINE shape is the shape used to determine which block the player is looking at.
translations.opt.commandExecutionRequirment.desc: Whether or not execution of commands defined by this mod require OP permission.
translations.opt.craftingTableBUD.desc: Detect the block updates around crafting tables.
translations.opt.creativeUpwardsSpeed.desc: Set the speed which the player is flying upwards at in the creative mode.
translations.opt.debugStickSkipsInvaildState.desc: Prevent debug sticks change blocks to a invalid state. By now, the option doesn't work in some cases, like changing the `shape` property of a rail can still turn the rail in to an illegal state and get broken.
Disable the calculation of explosion exposure to reduce the lag caused by stacked TNT explosions. This will also mean that blocks cannot prevent entities from be influenced by explosions. 
This feature may not work properly if the Lithium is loaded.
translations.opt.disableProjectileRandomness.desc: Remove the random speed of projectiles. It could be used in testing, but don't forget to disable it if not needed.
translations.opt.enabledTools.desc: Item tools, which makes bone and bricks powerful. Requires carpet-fabric.
translations.opt.endEyeTeleport.desc: When the player uses ender eyes, teleport it to where it looks at.
translations.opt.entityExplosionInfluence.desc:
Send how entities are affected by explosions. 
This feature may not work properly if the Lithium is loaded.
translations.opt.entityExplosionRaysVisiblity.desc: Explosion ray (used to calculate the exposure of entities) renderer.
translations.opt.entityExplosionRaysLifetime.desc: The number of ticks the rendered rays remains.
translations.opt.entityLogAutoArchiving.desc: Archive the entity log produced within a single session automatically.
translations.opt.getEntityRangeExpansion.desc: In the vanilla getEntities() method, only entities which are in subchunks whose Cheshev distance to the given AABB is smaller than 2 blocks is could be seen. Usually it doesn't matter, but when height of some of the entities is greater than 2 blocks or the width is greater than 4 blocks, it can cause some issues, especially when the entity is close to the boundary of subchunks. Change it to a higher value may fix some bugs about interaction between entities and something else.
translations.opt.hideSuvivalSaves.desc: Hide worlds that is likely to be suvivial saves to prevent it to be opened accidently.
translations.opt.hotbarLength.desc: The number of item stacks the hotbar can contain. Note that this feature is not finished currently, some features like saving hotbars and vanilla hotbat texture is not aviilable.
translations.opt.hudAlignMode.desc: Move the HUDs to a given location.
translations.opt.hudStyles.desc:
The style of the HUDs, containing zero or more flags below: 
 - B: Render a gray background
 - L: Align the headers on the left and the data on the right
 - R: Change the color of headers to red
translations.opt.hudTextSize.desc: Set the size of the text in the HUDs.
translations.opt.interactableB36.desc: Allow players to break block-36s and place things against it.
translations.opt.language.desc: The main language of the Mod.
translations.opt.maxClientTicksPerFrame.desc: Set the maximum number of ticks can be processed within a single frame when the FPS is lower than 20, setting it to a low value may fix the bug which makes players cannot toggle the flying state when the FPS is too low.
translations.opt.maxEndEyeTpRadius.desc: Set the maximum range of teleporting with endEyeTeleport.
translations.opt.minecartPlacementOnNonRailBlocks.des: Allow players to place minecarts directly on the ground.
translations.opt.mobFastKill.desc: /kill kill mobs by removes them directly instead of damaging them.
translations.opt.projectileChunkLoading.desc: Allow projectiles to load chunks in their processing, maybe helpful in testing pearl canons.  Note that if a projectile flies at a extremely high speed when the option is set to true, the server may be lagged greatly.
translations.opt.projectileChunkLoadingRange.desc: Set the radius of entity processing chunks created by projectileChunkLoading.
translations.opt.projectileChunkLoadingPermanence.des: Projectiles load the chunks they are in permanently when projectileChunkLoading is enabled.
translations.opt.projectileRandomnessScale.desc: The amount of the randomness of projectiles.
translations.opt.railNoAutoConnection.desc: Prevent the shape of rails from being changed by sorrounding rails.
translations.opt.rejectChunkTicket.desc: Prevent the chunks from being loaded in some ways.
translations.opt.renderBlockShape.desc: Enable or disable block boundary box renderer.
translations.opt.renderFluidShape.desc: Enable or disable the renderer of outlines, heights, and vectors of flowing directions of target fluids.
translations.opt.renderRedstoneGateInfo.desc: Display the output level of repeaters and comparators the player looks at.
translations.opt.serverSyncedBox.desc: Enable or disable the server-side hitbox renderer.
translations.opt.serverSyncedBoxRenderRange.desc: The maximum Cheshev distance beween entity rendered with its bounding bix and the player.All non-positive values are consided as positive infinite.
translations.opt.skipUnloadedChunkInRaycasting.desc: Ignore potential collisions in unloaded chunks in raycasts. Enabling it may speed up long distance raycasts.
translations.opt.skippedGenerationStages.desc: Skip some stages in the world generation.
translations.opt.stableHudLocation.desc: Make the location of huds more stable when the length of lines change frequently.
translations.opt.strictAccessingPathParsing.desc: Treat accessing paths strictly, to make them more relyable. Disable it may make accessing processes more likely to fail in varible environments.
translations.opt.tntChunkLoading.desc: Allow or disallow TNT entities to load chunks in their processing, maybe helpful in making some kind of TNT canons. Note that if an TNT entity flies at a extremely high speed when the option is set to true.
translations.opt.tntChunkLoadingPermanence.desc: TNT entities load the chunks they are in permanently when tntChunkLoading is enabled.
translations.opt.tntChunkLoadingRange.desc: Set the radius of entity processing chunks created by tntChunkLoading.
translations.opt.err.rnum: The given value is not a number
translations.misc.negativeid: The value of id cannot be negative
translations.misc.side.desc: Where the entities are selected from. Note that this feature is not thread-safe, so it should be used in some simple commands without side-effects.
translations.misc.cancelhotbarstorage: Hotbars can only be loaded/saved when the value of option hotbarLength is 9.
translations.misc.protver.err: The protcol version of the MessMod installed on the server is different from the one on your client,it is recommended to install MessMod with the same version as the server.
